header.name: Amira Gayatri
header.subheading: Click on the page you want to see to open it!

summary.text: Graduated in Computer Science, has five years of experience in web development, mainly as a Front-end Developer. Extensive experience with React and WordPress, among other programming languages and frameworks. Also interested in web accessibility.

grad.text: B.Sc. Computer Science at Universidade de São Paulo, São Carlos - SP, Brazil (February/2017, December/2022)

atip.subitem: Using React, Next.js, StyledComponents and TypeScript in projects, working with the mexican Pepsico team.

techviz.subitem: Using React, Next.js, Svelte, StyledComponents and TypeScript in projects.

encora.subitem: Using React, Vue.js and Laravel in projects

raccoon.subitem: Using React, WordPress, AMP, Next.js, PHP, HTML, Javascript and SCSS in projects. Also acting as leader of the developers guild, leading knowledge exchange meetings and training interns.

partenero.text: Full Stack Intern at Partenero. (February/2020, June/2020)

liven.text: Front-end Mobile Intern at Liven. (September/2019, December/2019)
liven.subitem: Using React and React Native in projects

otherframeworks.text: SCSS, AMP, React Native, Vue.js and Svelte

accessibility.text: W3Cx 'Introduction to Web Accessibility' course (September and October/2022)

shehacks.text: 1st place (out of 20 groups) at SheHacks 2019, a Hackathon by Facebook (September/2019)

principia.text: Volunteer tutor to robotics classes in public schools by “Principia - Robôs na Escola” (February/2019 to July/2019)

vemPraUSP.text: Volunteer tutor at “Vem Pra USP!”, an Online Scratch and App Inventor course for public high school students (October/2019)

pet.text: Volunteer tutor twice at Basic Computer Skills Course for Seniors (March/2018 to May/2018 and September/2018 to November/2018)

header.title: Color variation generator
header.summary: Creates color variations for black and white, the default number of variations is 10 in each direction, but it can be changed
